__e: All you have to do is look that guy in the eyes, say your name is Marissa Heller, and we are golden.
A weight lifts... the sun shines a little brighter... and, for a brief moment at least... we find a little peace.
Every day my head becomes more clear and I shall be able to make the best deals.
They make the night brighter than the day.
That was brighter than I thought it was gonna be, Al.
It's even brighter than it was an hour ago.
And sure, dear friends, my thanks are too dear a halfpenny.
What else are you doing to find Heller?
I was told we were to discuss Heller's situation.
- She sure got everyone in a tizzy.
Before we knew it, there had been a great upheaval in the world.
Think if you'd had just one king since before the first sunrise. You'd be in a kerfuffle, too.
Perhaps we should come back in the morning when it's lighter, and when there are more people.
Heller's not stupid enough to carry it with him, and without it, whatever he knows or whatever he thinks he knows won't matter.
